bool NavSearchHandler::addMatches (  NParamBlock &  rparams,
const SearchResultRequest *  sr,
bool  addArea,
uint32  maxNbrMatches,
uint32  areaStartIndex,
uint32  itemStartIndex,
uint16  regionParamID,
uint16  areaParamID,
uint16  areaIndexParamID,
uint16  itemParamID,
uint16  itemIndexParamID,
NParam *  areaIndexParam = NULL,
NParam *  areaParam = NULL,
NParam *  itemIndexParam = NULL,
NParam *  itemParam = NULL,
NParam *  regionParam = NULL,
int  version = 0,
bool  addAreaIndex = true,
bool  addItemIndex = true,
uint32  headingID = MAX_UINT32
) 
 

Add area and item params.

Parameters:
rparams Where to add the params.
sr The request with the matches.
addArea If to add area matches or not.
maxNbrMatches The maximum number of matches to add.
areaStartIndex The index for the first area match to add.
itemStartIndex The index for the first item match to add.
regionParamID The paramID to add regions too.
areaParamID The paramID to add area matches too.
areaIndexParamID The paramID for start index and total number matches.
itemParamID The paramID to add item matches too.
itemIndexParamID The paramID for start index and total number matches.
areaIndexParam The param to use instead of areaIndexParamID. Index is added before matches.
areaParam The param to use instead of areaIndexParam.
itemIndexParam The param to use instead of itemIndexParamID. Index is added before matches.
itemParam The param to use instead of itemIndexParam.
regionParam The param to use instead of regionParamID.
version 0 is orig, 1 is with image name and with 32 bit region Search location type.
addAreaIndex If to add areaIndex, default true.
addItemIndex If to add itemIndex, default true.
headingID The current heading id for combined/compact search, used for retrieving default image name for match.
Returns:
If added any matches.

void NavSearchHandler::addRegionTo (  SearchMatch *  match,
map< const SearchMatch *, uint16, SearchMatchIDAndNameLessThan > &  regionSearchMap,
NParam &  pregion,
int  version
)  const [private]
 

Adds a Nav region to regionSearchMap and pregion.

Parameters:
match Might add fake region to match if no regions but have location name. This for external search.

bool NavSearchHandler::handleSearch (  UserItem *  userItem,
NavRequestPacket *  req,
NavReplyPacket *  reply
) 
 

Handles a search packet.

Parameters:
userItem The user.
req The request to search.
reply Set status of if problem.
Returns:
True if searched ok, false if not and then reply's status is set.
